recipesJson.name: Pink Punch
recipesJson.author: Sublimeice
recipesJson.description:
Inspired by this recipe here -----> https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/175889#pink_punch_lemonade_clone_by_denske

I didn't have the lemon's he had, so I used juicy lemon cap and Lemon Sicily. Dropped the pink lemonade by LB down a hair due to using lemon sicily. (that shits potent!)

Super sweet can be adjusted. I just like it on the higher side for this. 0.5% to 1%
